text: Empty your mind, be formless. Shapeless, like water.
Be like water making its way through cracks. Do not be assertive, but adjust to the object, and you shall find a way around or through it.
The enemy of my enemy is my friend... until they become my enemy too.
An army marches on its stomach. A wise general knows where the best taverns are.
The wise warrior avoids the battle. The foolish commander insists on fighting even when outnumbered.
First they ignore you, then they laugh at you, then they fight you, then you win... unless they have a bigger army.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts. Perseverance is more important than being right the first time.
